name: App Permission Manager Ui
description:
Permission Manager is a must need app for everyone. This app has been built to manage apps and their respective permissions very easily. This app is a permission allowance manager. By using permission manager, you can easily manage all the permissions of the apps installed on your device without any kind of restrictions. Allow or disallow required permissions by certain apps installed on your device according to your needs or choice.


Download Now->

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.permission.apps.cloud.manager
